last_episode_to_air.name: Camping
last_episode_to_air.overview: Class K's camping trip spirals into chaos after Mitchell takes his pranks a step too far. Stephen goes missing when he encounters an old drama school rival. Warren reveals he has a secret crush on someone.

name: Bad Education
overview: Young teacher Alfie Wickers is "the worst teacher ever to grace the British education system" â€“ at Abbey Grove School, in Watford, Hertfordshire.

episodes.name: Parents' Evening
episodes.overview: It's parents' evening and Alfie is under pressure to mark his mock exam papers.

episodes.name: Sex Education
episodes.overview: Parents are worried about the impending arrival of the French exchange students.

episodes.name: Self Defence
episodes.overview: A new computer game craze hits Abbey Grove School, affecting both pupils and staff.

episodes.name: School Trip
episodes.overview: On a school trip, Alfie and Gulliver take their pupils to a petting zoo and ink museum.

episodes.name: Football Match
episodes.overview: Alfie steps in as coach when Abbey Grove takes on the local public school at football.

episodes.name: Politics
episodes.overview: Pickwell has designs on getting Fraser's job, and it is election time at Abbey Grove.

episodes.name: Swimming Gala
episodes.overview: It's the Abbey Grove swimming gala and Alfie's class compete in the synchronised diving.

episodes.name: The American
episodes.overview: Alfie is shocked when a charming new American teacher takes over his class.

episodes.name: Funeral
episodes.overview: Abbey Grove is rocked by the news that deputy headmistress Miss Pickwell is dead.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: For Valentine's Day, Mr Fraser plans a special Take Me Out to help shy kids find love.

episodes.name: Drugs
episodes.overview: Mr Fraser organises a guest speaker for Drugs Awareness Day, to Miss Gulliver's annoyance.

episodes.name: Fundraiser
episodes.overview: When Abbey Grove is plunged into financial ruin can Alfie come up with a plan to save it?

episodes.name: Strike
episodes.overview: With the threat of a staff redundancy the teachers of Abbey Grove go on strike.

episodes.name: After School Clubs
episodes.overview: Alfie tries to attend a book group, a LARPing club and a leaving party at the same time.

episodes.name: Sports Day
episodes.overview: It's sports day and Fraser has hired the most inappropriate new teacher to oversee events.

episodes.name: Fundraising
episodes.overview: After running him over, Alfie and his class raise funds for the caretaker's surgery.

episodes.name: The Exam
episodes.overview: Alfie never passed his biology GCSE, so he must resit the exam with his own class.

episodes.name: The Finale
episodes.overview: Alfie realises he can't go on teaching without his beloved class and quits Abbey Grove.

episodes.name: Rivals
episodes.overview: Stephen and Mitchell are told one of them will be fired so go to extreme lengths to save their jobs. Meanwhile, Fraser has accidentally started printing the entire internet.

episodes.name: Whodunnit
episodes.overview: Stephen is determined to find out who snitched on him about Class Kâ€™s trip to a drag brunch. Meanwhile, Fraser mistakes an Ofsted inspector for a Task Rabbit.

episodes.name: Prison
episodes.overview: Hoburn tries a prison experience programme at the school to teach the kids discipline. Class K end up incarcerated with Stephen, whoâ€™s prepping an audition as a hardened criminal.

episodes.name: Trailblazer
episodes.overview: After Class K make Stephen feel old and irrelevant on his birthday, he goes to ridiculous lengths to prove he is still a trailblazer.

episodes.name: Glow Up
episodes.overview: Stephen is desperate to get rid of Mitchell who has moved in after his girlfriend threw him out. So Class K and Stephen give Mitchell a glow up in the hope sheâ€™ll take him back.

episodes.name: School Play
episodes.overview: Stephen wants to turn the school play into a showcase for his talents to impress an agent, but Hoburn has more sinister plans to use it as a way of closing the school down.

episodes.name: Boxing
episodes.overview: After spending their life savings on a wedding venue mix-up, Mitchell risks losing Kayleigh. Class K come to the rescue, promoting a boxing match at Abbey Grove with dramatic consequences for Warren.

episodes.name: Face-Off
episodes.overview: When Mitchell gets a bit part in a gangster film, it goes to his head. Swayed by the hype, Hoburn instructs him and Stephen to swap jobs - but with the school drama competition looming, Class K aren't keen on the changes.

episodes.name: Fitness
episodes.overview: Hoburn enlists fitness guru Mo Dix to get the school back in shape. While Class K protest under Mo's regime, Stephen falls for him, going to great lengths to get rid of Mitchell so Mo can replace him as the new PE teacher.

episodes.name: Haunted House
episodes.overview: The recovery of Stephen and Mitchellâ€™s old time capsule prompts an overnight break-in and some ghostly encounters and revelations for Class K. Hoburn is desperate to keep the identity of the new art teacher a secret.

episodes.name: Reading
episodes.overview: When Jinx abandons her studies to spend more time with Mitchell, Class K struggle with their exam prep and ask Fraser to help, leading to an unusual interpretation of Pygmalion - involving an actual pig.

episodes.name: Camping
episodes.overview: Class K's camping trip spirals into chaos after Mitchell takes his pranks a step too far. Stephen goes missing when he encounters an old drama school rival. Warren reveals he has a secret crush on someone.
